title: Electrophilic aromatic substitution in eutectic-type mixtures: from an old concept to new sustainable horizons
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1215-1223
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00051J, Critical Review
Open Access

Tatiana Martí, Xavier Marset, Celia Guillem, Diego J. Ramón, Gabriela Guillena
This review provides a critical overview on the use of sustainable eutectic mixtures in SEAr transformations.
